attributes.action: Research into the feasibility of using iron for fuel into cars of the future
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Iron is one very common element, but  when  it reacts with oxygen it releases a lot of energy. 
 If it were to be used  as a fuel it could be produced quite easily, at low cost and is also much greener then biofuels (which aren't compltely carbon neutral it should be added)and alot greener then hyrogen cells.
 It would also mean that for fuel we would be less dependent on other countries.
